itha ikmanin kriyakari wime hakiyawa, ikmanin oonama kalagunayakata, deshagunayakata, samaja kramayakata hadagasime hakiyawa, wadahinsa windadaraganimin thama ananyathawaya aarakshakaraganime hakiyawa, diwiparaduwata thaba meheyuma sarthaka karaganimata kriyathmaka wima, ikmanin mithuran athikaragena thama meheyuma ho aramuna sandaha samajikayin ekathukaraganime hakiyawa wani kusalathawayan
kasala wargikaranaya, kasala gabadakaranaya, asurumkaranaya, yanadi sewawan sandaha singappuruwe samagamwalata nidahase lankawata enna puluwan.
ee nisa warga, kula ha aagam bhedawalata thibena piliganima nathi kota jathiya eekagra kirimata hethuwana lesa nuthana jathiya goda naga ganimata asamath wiya.
dewiwarun athara obata samana an kenek naththe ya.
kese wethath mita wasarakata ihathadi ema motar rathaya siya mithurakuta alawi kala bawa parlimenthu manthri namal rajapaksha bibisita pawasa thibini.
(saukhyamath nirupana shilpiyekuge pisime potha) hi kathuwariya wana aya, warthamanaye di mumbayi, gowa saha nawa dilli yana pranthawala diyunu awanhal thunak sathu sarthaka awanhal adhipathiniyaki.

palamuwenma rogiyage parshawayen roga lakshana prakasha kirimak siduwenawa.ehidi rogayata adala yayi sithana siyapa karunu nosangawa waidyawarayata pawasima rogiyage parshawayen siduwiya yuthuyi.parana kathawakuth thiyenawa nithignyayatath waidyawarayatath borunokiya yuthumayi kiyala.mokada nithignyayata boru kiwoth adi 6k udatath waidyawarayata boru kimen adi 6k yatatath yanna siduwenawane.esema rogiya waidyawaraya kara paminiya yuththe ohu kere purna wishwasayakin.adala waidyawaraya kerehi yamata yam degidiyawak athnam wenath sudusu waidyawarayeku soya yama nuwanata huruyi.

samaja madhyawala pa්rawardhana katayuthu wenuwenda rupiyal miliyana 6 ka pamana wiyadamak dara thibuni.
” eya ese bawata ma hisa selawiya.

demala eelamwadaye hisa bandu prabhakaran wanasa me rata nidahas kara ganimata diwi dun siyalu ranawiruwanta ee kuriru thrasthawadaye goduru bawata pathwa jiwitha ahimi wu sinhala, demala, muslim yanadi siyalu lankika jana kotaswalata da apata kala haki dushta ha drohi aparadhaya wanneda me rata beda dima bawa api thirasarawa kiyamu.
mage aarakshaka sebalu dan methanata enawa athi."

me telinatyaya nisa thamayi mata anith dewal sandaha awasthawa labune.
ehi sewaya karana minisun nagara sabhawe kuli padanamin rakiya karana kamkaruwan we.
jagath pathirana ge prathicharaye thibunu demala kathawa mata ekwarama notherunu nisa mama pahatha aakarayata pilithurak dunimi.

ee anuwa, ekala chakralekhanaya anuwa purna haniyakata pathwu niwasakata rupiyal wisi dahasak saha ardha haniyakata rupiyal pandahasaka mudalak labadena lesa pawathi bawath ee awasthawedi agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahatha indiyawe nirathawi siti sancharaya pawa atharamanga nawatha dama meratata pamina ganwathura hani pradesha nirikshanaya kara, karu jayasuriya mahatha haniyata lakwu janathawage niwasa thanimata nayakathwaya labadimata pathkala bawath ehidi karu jayasuriya mahatha idiripathkala thorathuru anuwa agramathya ranil wikramasinha mahatha wisin purna hani sandaha labadun wandi mudala rupiyal lakshaya dakwath ardha hani sandaha labadun rupiyal pandahasaka mudala rupiyal hathalis dahasa dakwa ihala damimata katayuthu kala bawada sandahan kala.
